title: Nithin Jake Joseph
text:
Nithin Jake Joseph is an Indian television actor who appears in <a href="Malayalam">Malayalam</a>-language television shows. After making his debut in the 2017 TV series "<a href="Manjal%20Prasadam">Manjal Prasadam</a>", he rose to fame by playing the leading role of Aadhithyan in the soap opera "<a href="Neelakkuyil%20%28TV%20series%29">Neelakkuyil</a>" from 2018 to 2020. He is currently playing the lead role in <a href="Surya%20TV">Surya TV</a>'s "<a href="Kaliveedu%20%28Malayalam%20TV%20series%29">Kaliveedu</a>" opposite <a href="Rebecca%20Santhosh">Rebecca Santhosh</a>.
Career.
Nithin has played minor roles in feature films "<a href="Anuraga%20Karikkin%20Vellam">Anuraga Karikkin Vellam</a>" (2016) and "<a href="The%20Great%20Father">The Great Father</a>" (2017). He has also played the lead roles in the feature film "Mashipachayum Kallupencilum" and the short film "Akshitha" (2021).
He made his television debut through the mythological television series "<a href="Manjal%20Prasadam">Manjal Prasadam</a>" aired in <a href="Flowers%20%28TV%20channel%29">Flowers</a> from 2016 to 2017. He played the role of Eshwar, a herpetologist. The show won the Kerala State Television Award in 2017 for the Second Best Tele-serial. 
He then played the titular character of Adhityan in <a href="Asianet%20%28TV%20channel%29">Asianet</a>'s popular soap-opera drama "<a href="Neelakkuyil%20%28TV%20series%29">Neelakkuyil</a>". His popularity from the show gained him a spot in the "Most Desirable Men on Television" list published by <a href="The%20Times%20of%20India">The Times of India</a> in 2019. 
He played a doting younger brother, Harikrishnan in his third serial "<a href="Jeevitha%20Nouka%20%28TV%20series%29">Jeevitha Nouka</a>" telecasted on <a href="Mazhavil%20Manorama">Mazhavil Manorama</a>. He is currently playing the lead role of Arjun in the ongoing series "<a href="Kaliveedu%20%28Malayalam%20TV%20series%29">Kaliveedu</a>", which is an official remake of the successful <a href="Tamil%20language">Tamil</a> show "<a href="Roja%20%28Tamil%20TV%20series%29">Roja</a>".
Personal life.
Nithin is an engineer-turned-actor. He is married to Angitha. They have a son, Adam Jake Joseph.
